title: How to Edit a Page in Wikipedia

steps.title: Find the article that has a mistake (wrong information, spelling, etc.
steps.content: Find the article that has a mistake (wrong information, spelling, etc. )

steps.title: Correct the mistake you have found.
steps.content: Correct the mistake you have found. Take a look again. Did you accidentally remove a word? Is there is anything else you could correct?

steps.title: Click on Show preview.
steps.content: Click on Show preview . It will give you the chance to take a look at the article with your edits without saving the edit.

steps.title: Click Publish changes.
steps.content: Click Publish changes . When you edited the page and clicked Show preview , click Publish changes to save your edits. Always do your best to leave an edit summary to describe that changes you have made.

steps.title: Fill in the space between {{subst:trim|1= and }} stating unambiguously what you want to do.
steps.content: Fill in the space between {{subst:trim|1= and }} stating unambiguously what you want to do. If what you are doing is ambiguous, consider discussing the edit on the talk page before making the edit.

steps.title: Click on Show preview.
steps.content: Click on Show preview . This allows you to view how the changes will appear on the talk page.
